name: versa
title: Versa
text:
As senior Front End Developer I led several projects for VERSA, often from beginning of project to final delivery.

I have had a consulting role here where we have developed new platforms and standards for integration of front end and back end in the companies projects.

I have helped establish company wide standards in Front End code where projects did not have universal standards and techniques. I have spent a deal of time establishing standards that can separate the front end code from the back end while maintaining efficient integration and keeping code DRY.

I have spent time mentoring and training junior developers in coding practices and techniques.

Projects worked on included:

Glen Eira City Council - Led the front end development of rebranding of city council website. Established a pattern library for maintaining a large library of html/javascript components. Incorporated library into Umbraco. Designed interactive animations for UX. Site built with combination of vanilla javascript (ES6) and React/Redux.
https://www.gleneira.vic.gov.au/
https://library.gleneira.vic.gov.au/
https://www.geleisure.com.au/

SCENIC Waterways - Multisite solution for Tourism company with several international brandings. Built react components for many sections of the site including tour search and bookings.
https://emeraldwaterways.co.uk
https://www.scenic.com.au
https://www.evergreentours.com.au/

Village Cinemas - Worked on the rebuild of Village Cinemas booking system which was not responsive until we took this over. The whole booking system is now built in react and 100% responsive.
https://villagecinemas.com.au/ (Our code starts when you click on ‘Buy Tickets’)

Melbourne City Mission Campaign - site helping raise funds to fight homelessness. I was the sole front end developer on this site and built it from start to finish.
https://www.mcm.org.au/build-a-room

name: skyjed
title: Skyjed
text: Designed and built the UX and Front End interface for a new web app for companies to assess their product line. As sole Front End developer I oversaw the whole front end interface development in react and redux.

name: agent3
title: Agent 3
text: I developed a react-based documentation tool, that scans through react components and generates documentation based on the javascript and comments. I utilised react-docgen to generate the JSON documentation and created an interface from the generated JSON. I also assisted in maintenance and development on some of Agent 3's Drupal 7 websites.

name: eikon
title: Eikon Group
text: Eikon are a post production company developing a new in-house CMS that grant licenses to cinemas so they can show films. Working with their backend team, I developed the UI and front end for their in-house CMS in a .NET environment. I also set them up with GIT, implemented a style guide, and introduced the back end team to SASS and gulp as a means to theme their projects.

name: cv
title: Tim McDonald - Online CV
text: This website is built using react.js. You can view the source code on github. Filter results using the search box above, or view the jobs as icons by clicking the icon button above. Click on each icon to view more information about the related job. Also, try inspecting the code and components in a chrome inspector.

name: siteyourart
title: Site Your Art
text: Site Your Art is a project I have conceived, built, designed and developed on my own. It is a website builder for creatives (mostly actors) to set up their own online portfolio and website. Built on the Drupal platform.

name: dennis
title: Dennis Publishing
text: At Dennis I worked as a full stack developer performing drupal maintenance, development and design of Dennis Publishing websites including Den of Geek, The Week, Cyclist.co.uk, alphr.co.uk and more.

name: sapient
title: SapientNitro
text:
I helped set up the front end on the bulk of a lot of pages for the new Dove.com. We used Sapient’s backbone based Unilever platform and worked closely with the designers to follow Dove’s strict design guidelines.

I also worked as a consultant for the Lynx team in developing concepts for a new Lynx campaign, advising what was possible in HTML and developing concept animations to be used in later builds and client pitches.

name: crocodile
title: The Crocodile
text: Working on a Drupal 8 website for Waypoint Capital. I was the sole developer on this site. I was provided with desktop designs but had to adapt them for mobile.

name: akqa
title: AKQA
text: Working on a web app for Nike for International Womens Week. The app was built in CQ5 and a lot of my involvement involved integration with a Nike login web service. A lot of work with Ajax requests (without jQuery) and local storage.

name: mediamonks
title: Media Monks
text: Assisting on the Guinness.com website. Site was built in backbone marionette. A lot of my involvement was working on accessibility and getting the site to work on older mobile devices including native Samsung Galaxy browsers.

name: telegraph
title: The Telegraph
text: Sole Developer. Built a mini website for Fenwick and the Telegraph to act as an advent calendar counting down The 12 Days of Christmas.

name: akqa
title: AKQA
text: Involved in building the Contact section of the Barclays Help and Support website. The website is built on CQ5. Lots of css and animation involved in this. I was in charge of the side panel slideout, especially the css animations, that can be seen here.

name: akqa
title: AKQA
text: Nike ZOOM. We built a page for Nike, tracking your fastest run throughout the Month of August with the Nike running app.

name: crocodile
title: The Crocodile
text: Sole developer. Drupal theming and developing for extreme sailing team Alinghi.

name: oliveri
title: Oliveri
text: Oliveri is an Italian-based homeware eCommerce website. Built on Magento. I was in charge of building all their front end templates.

name: blackswan
title: Black Swan
text: Worked on a Panasonic inflight entertainment system to work on personal devices on flights for Dragon Air and Virgin Airlines.

name: 1000heads
title: 1000 Heads
text: Working on an iPhone/AndroidTV Size Finder app for Curry’s Digital.

name: mccormackmorrison
title: McCormack & Morrison
text: Building all front end for corporate website of GLH Hotels and GREAT Britain.

name: mirror
title: Trinity Mirror
text: Working on web applications and core development for the Daily Mirror and other national newspapers. I also built the API for all their quizzes.

name: velti
title: Velti
text: Building a Panasonic Inflight Entertainment System to work on mobile and laptop devices for clients including British Airways, KLM, Japan Airlines and Air France.
